resources.string: Welcome to aNote! This is a space for you to note down everything you like.
To add a note just click the \"+\" button. Remember you can mark your note as important to see it first in the list.
To see details of a note, just click on that in the list.
When you don\'t need a note anymore, you can remove it: first click on that in the list then click on the \"remove\" button.
